verses.verse: And they brought <S%H935><s%> in the ark <S%H727><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, and set <S%H3322><s%> it in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> that David <S%H1732><s%> had pitched <S%H5186><s%> for it <S%H7126><s%>: and they offered burnt-offerings <S%H8002><s%> and peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God <S%H430><s%>.

And when David <S%H1732><s%> had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of offering <S%H5927><s%> the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> and the peace-offerings <S%H8002><s%>, he blessed <S%H1288><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And he dealt <S%H2505><s%> to every one <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, both man <S%H376><s%> and woman <S%H802><s%>, to every one <S%H376><s%> a loaf <S%H3603><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%>, and a portion of flesh <S%H829><s%>, and a cake of raisins <S%H809><s%>.

And he appointed <S%H5414><s%> certain of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and to celebrate <S%H2142><s%> and to thank <S%H3034><s%> and praise <S%H1984><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>:

Asaph <S%H623><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%>, and second <S%H4932><s%> to him Zechariah <S%H2148><s%>, Jeiel <S%H3273><s%>, and Shemiramoth <S%H8070><s%>, and Jehiel <S%H3171><s%>, and Mattithiah <S%H4993><s%>, and Eliab <S%H446><s%>, and Benaiah <S%H1141><s%>, and Obed-edom <S%H5654><s%>, and Jeiel <S%H3273><s%>, with psalteries <S%H5035><s%> and with harps <S%H3658><s%>; and Asaph <S%H623><s%> with cymbals <S%H4700><s%>, sounding aloud <S%H8085><s%>;

and Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> and Jahaziel <S%H3166><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> with trumpets <S%H2689><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>.

Then on that day <S%H3117><s%> did David <S%H1732><s%> first <S%H7218><s%> ordain <S%H5414><s%> to give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Asaph <S%H623><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>.
O give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, call <S%H7121><s%> upon his name <S%H8034><s%>; Make known <S%H3045><s%> his doings <S%H5949><s%> among the peoples <S%H5971><s%>.
Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto him <S%H2167><s%>, sing praises unto him <S%H7878><s%>; Talk ye of all his marvellous works <S%H6381><s%>.
Glory <S%H1984><s%> ye in his holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>; Let the heart <S%H3820><s%> of them rejoice <S%H8055><s%> that seek <S%H1245><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Seek <S%H1875><s%> ye Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> and his strength <S%H5797><s%>; Seek <S%H1245><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> evermore <S%H8548><s%>.
Remember <S%H2142><s%> his marvellous <S%H6381><s%> works that he hath done <S%H6213><s%>, His wonders <S%H4159><s%>, and the judgments <S%H4941><s%> of his mouth <S%H6310><s%>,
O ye seed <S%H2233><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> his servant <S%H5650><s%>, Ye children <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, his chosen ones <S%H972><s%>.
He is Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>; His judgments <S%H4941><s%> are in all the earth <S%H776><s%>.
Remember <S%H2142><s%> his covenant <S%H1285><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>, The word <S%H1697><s%> which he commanded <S%H6680><s%> to a thousand <S%H505><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>,
The covenant which he made <S%H3772><s%> with Abraham <S%H85><s%>, And his oath <S%H7621><s%> unto Isaac <S%H3327><s%>,
And confirmed <S%H5975><s%> the same unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%> for a statute <S%H2706><s%>, To Israel <S%H3478><s%> for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%>,
Saying <S%H559><s%>, Unto thee will I give <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, The lot <S%H2256><s%> of your inheritance <S%H5159><s%>;
When ye were but a few <S%H4557><s%> men in number <S%H4592><s%>, Yea, very few, and sojourners in it <S%H1481><s%>;
And they went <S%H1980><s%> about from nation <S%H1471><s%> to nation <S%H1471><s%>, And from one kingdom <S%H4467><s%> to another <S%H312><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>.
He suffered <S%H3240><s%> no man <S%H376><s%> to do them wrong <S%H6231><s%>; Yea <S%H3198><s%>, he reproved kings for their sakes <S%H4428><s%>,
Saying <S%H5060><s%>, Touch not mine anointed <S%H4899><s%> ones <S%H5030><s%>, And do my prophets no harm <S%H7489><s%>.
Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, all the earth <S%H776><s%>; Show forth <S%H1319><s%> his salvation <S%H3444><s%> from day <S%H3117><s%> to day <S%H3117><s%>.
Declare <S%H5608><s%> his glory <S%H3519><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, His marvellous works <S%H6381><s%> among all the peoples <S%H5971><s%>.
For great <S%H1419><s%> is Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and greatly <S%H3966><s%> to be praised <S%H1984><s%>: He also is to be feared <S%H3372><s%> above all gods <S%H430><s%>.
For all the gods <S%H430><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> are idols <S%H457><s%>: But Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%>.
Honor <S%H1935><s%> and majesty <S%H1935><s%> are before him <S%H6440><s%>: Strength <S%H5797><s%> and gladness <S%H2304><s%> are in his place <S%H4725><s%>.

Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, ye kindreds <S%H4940><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%>, Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> glory <S%H3519><s%> and strength <S%H5797><s%>;

Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> due unto his name <S%H8034><s%>: Bring <S%H5375><s%> an offering <S%H4503><s%>, and come <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H7812><s%>: Worship Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in holy <S%H6944><s%> array <S%H1927><s%>.
Tremble <S%H2342><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H776><s%>, all the earth: The world <S%H8398><s%> also is established <S%H3559><s%> that it cannot be moved <S%H4131><s%>.

Let the heavens <S%H8064><s%> be glad <S%H8055><s%>, and let the earth <S%H776><s%> rejoice <S%H1523><s%>; And let them say <S%H559><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> reigneth <S%H4427><s%>.
Let the sea <S%H3220><s%> roar <S%H7481><s%>, and the fulness <S%H4393><s%> thereof <S%H7704><s%>; Let the field exult <S%H5970><s%>, and all that is therein;

Then shall the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the wood <S%H3293><s%> sing for joy <S%H7442><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; For he cometh <S%H935><s%> to judge <S%H8199><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>.
O give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; for he is good <S%H2896><s%>; For his lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>.

And say <S%H559><s%> ye <S%H3467><s%>, Save us <S%H430><s%>, O God of our salvation <S%H3468><s%>, And gather us together <S%H6908><s%> and deliver <S%H5337><s%> us from the nations <S%H1471><s%>, To give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto thy holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>, And to triumph <S%H7623><s%> in thy praise <S%H8416><s%>.

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, From everlasting <S%H5769><s%> even to everlasting <S%H5769><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>, and praised <S%H1984><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

So he left <S%H5800><s%> there <S%H6440><s%>, before the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Asaph <S%H623><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, to minister <S%H8334><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>, as every day <S%H3117><s%>'s work <S%H1697><s%> required <S%H3117><s%>;

and Obed-edom <S%H5654><s%> with their brethren <S%H251><s%>, threescore <S%H8346><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%>; Obed-edom <S%H5654><s%> also the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeduthun <S%H3038><s%> and Hosah <S%H2621><s%> to be doorkeepers <S%H7778><s%>;

and Zadok <S%H6659><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and his brethren <S%H251><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in the high place <S%H1116><s%> that was at Gibeon <S%H1391><s%>,

to offer <S%H5927><s%> burnt-offerings <S%H5930><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> morning <S%H1242><s%> and evening <S%H6153><s%>, even according to all that is written <S%H3789><s%> in the law <S%H8451><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, which he commanded <S%H6680><s%> unto Israel <S%H3478><s%>;

and with them Heman <S%H1968><s%> and Jeduthun <S%H3038><s%>, and the rest <S%H7605><s%> that were chosen <S%H1305><s%>, who were mentioned <S%H5344><s%> by name <S%H8034><s%>, to give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, because his lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>;

and with them Heman <S%H1968><s%> and Jeduthun <S%H3038><s%> with trumpets <S%H2689><s%> and cymbals <S%H4700><s%> for those that should sound <S%H8085><s%> aloud <S%H3627><s%>, and with instruments for the songs <S%H7892><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>; and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jeduthun <S%H3038><s%> to be at the gate <S%H8179><s%>.

And all the people <S%H5971><s%> departed <S%H3212><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> to his house <S%H1004><s%>: and David <S%H1732><s%> returned <S%H5437><s%> to bless <S%H1288><s%> his house <S%H1004><s%>.
